programme.title: 鳳凰午間專列
programme.desc: 《鳳凰午間專列》: 鳳凰中午的強檔新聞節目, 採取泛中華的報道態度, 關注中國內地的新聞, 也關注香港、台灣以及國際的新聞, 視野更廣闊, 話語空間亦突顯其獨特之處。節目簡潔、實事求事、快人一步, 將新聞帶給正在享用午餐的您, 讓您在休息時段毋須讀報而能輕鬆地接收全球最新出爐的新聞資訊。

programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: 新聞今日談
programme.desc: 《新聞今日談》: 節目針對當天最熱門時事問題, 在觀眾最關注的時刻即時作出評論, 讓觀眾更洞悉事件的真相。

programme.title: 鳳凰焦點新聞 2300
programme.desc: 《鳳凰焦點新聞》: 聚焦重大時政議題, 重大社會事件和新聞熱點, 原創性挖掘更多時事與背景, 分析梳理新聞的前因後果, 人物命運, 呈現權威觀點。

programme.title: 總編輯時間
programme.desc: 《總編輯時間》: 鳳凰總編輯重點編選和剖析一天最值得注意的頭條新聞, 解構事情的來龍去脈, 讓觀眾以評論員的眼光看世界, 深度瞭解重點事項。

programme.title: 鳳凰洲際快車
programme.desc: 《鳳凰洲際快車》是鳳凰衛視子夜時段的新聞資訊節目, 為您帶來兩岸三地, 以及國際社會的大小新聞、最新動態和局勢發展。

programme.title: 鳳凰正點播報 0100

programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight With Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua 第1集
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Crypto
programme.desc: Bloomberg Crypto covers the people, transactions, and technology shaping decentralised finance. Your weekly source for the latest news, analysis and interviews with the most influential stakeholders.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Can't Look Away: The Case Against Social Media
programme.desc: The documentary explores the real-life cases handled by the Social Media Victims Law Center, which assists parents of children who have died as a result of harmful internet activities.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第1集
programme.desc: BBVA CFO Luisa Gomez Bravo spearheads the Spanish bank's efforts to drive growth through digital innovation, expansion in corporate investment banking.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第2集
programme.desc: This episode profiles Duolingo CFO Matt Skaruppa, who has the world's leading language-learning app poised for a new phase of growth powered by AI.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第3集
programme.desc: AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer 第5季第7集
programme.desc: Gina Goetter is the CFO and COO of Hasbro. She's the architect of the company's transformation, diversifying its manufacturing footprint and investing in Hasbro's video game ambitions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Screentime: The Business Of Pop Culture
programme.desc: At Screentime, the icons and innovators behind today's entertainment revolution take the stage. The agenda: AI's creative takeover, the streaming wars, and what's next for legacy media.

programme.title: Bloomberg New Economy: Thriving In An Age Of Extremes
programme.desc: Candid conversations with CEOs, investors, and government leaders focused on how to navigate and prosper in this age of economic uncertainty. Hosted by Erik Schatzker in Singapore.

programme.title: Best Of The Bloomberg Women, Money & Power Event
programme.desc: Highlights of the event which brings together the most influential female voices in finance from around the world to discuss the biggest themes facing the future of business.

programme.title: The Deal With Alex Rodriguez And Jason Kelly 第3季第2集
programme.desc: Alex and Jason sit down with Mellody Hobson, co-CEO and president of Ariel Investments, to discuss her firm's newly launched fund, 'Project Level,' devoted to investing in women's sports.
